feature.label: objective-eclipse-utils.feature
feature.description:
Some useful utilities to develop in Objective projects
- Use CTRL+0 in maven project to create a test for the current open class, or create the class for the current test, or just toggle between the two if they exists
- In Civilized classes with primitive reservation, the reservation background becomes highlighted (in green) to make it easier to determine whether you're watching primitive or civilized code
- When you double-click a scenario in harness explorer, will open the scenario class and method in the eclips that launched harness explorer
feature.copyright:
This software was developed by brundle and can be used anywhere.
